review: I'm not a big fan of my new Fire Stick. I also have an Apple TV, which I find to be much more user friendly and reliable. The Fire Stick makes you watch an intro video which was kind of annoying. It really should make that optional for those of us that have half a brain and can figure out how to use it on our own. It also didn't acknowledge my Prime account at all. I then opted to try the "Free 30 day trial" that they advertise to you and was IMMEDIATELY charged for a full subscription. Some FREE trial... My Netflix is also horribly unreliable. I have had to install and uninstall it in order to keep it operational and the quality of my video is terrible, which I have never had a problem with when using my Apple TV or my Wii for watching Netflix. The interface is also confusing and it is difficult to determine what you have to pay for and what is included with your Prime account until you decide you really want to watch something, click on it, and discover they want you to pay for it. I was initially really excited about a cheaper alternative to another Apple TV but I think I'll just end up buying another one and throwing this thing in the spare room...
